trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that displays a document on a screen as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Angir en trykt kontroller som viser et dokument på skjermen som en rekke bilder.

trans-unit.source: Typically, to use the print preview feature, you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> class and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis for å bruke funksjonen Forhåndsvisning må du opprette en forekomst av en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>klasse og satt den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: The PreviewPrintController is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes, though you can use the PreviewPrintController when managing the display of your own print preview window.
trans-unit.target: PreviewPrintController brukes av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>klasser, og du kan bruke PreviewPrintController når du administrerer visning av dine egne forhåndsvisningsvinduet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, performs the print preview, and sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> back to the original value.
trans-unit.target: Når det brukes med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>til en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, utfører forhåndsvisningen og angir de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>tilbake til den opprinnelige verdien.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>oppretter den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som vises i løpet av forhåndsvisningen.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Etter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>kalles, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>til et bilde av én side.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden tømmer den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mens den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden opphever tildeling objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om utskrift av <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Oversikt over navneområde.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Captures the pages of a document as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer sidene i et dokument som en rekke bilder.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> image representation contained in a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> to implement your own print preview form.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>bilde representasjon i en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo>implementere forhåndsvisningsskjemaet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"></xref> that contains the pages of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"> </xref> som inneholder sidene i en <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som en rekke bilder.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this controller is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om denne kontrolleren brukes for forhåndsvisning.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører kontrollen sekvensen som bestemmer når og hvordan du forhåndsvise en side i dokumenter som skrives ut.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage kalles like etter den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, this method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det et unntak i en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelse for en <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, denne metoden er ikke kalles.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>oppretter den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som vises i løpet av forhåndsvisningen.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Etter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>kalles, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>til et bilde av én side.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner OnEndPage-metoden i <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mens den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden opphever tildeling objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerer dokumentet blir forhåndsvisning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data om hvordan du forhåndsvise en side i Skriv ut dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Fullfører kontrollen sekvensen som bestemmer når og hvordan du forhåndsvise dokumenter som skrives ut.

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles like etter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the print preview process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: Selv om et uventet unntak oppstod under forhåndsvisning prosessen, kalles OnEndPrint.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>oppretter den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som vises i løpet av forhåndsvisningen.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Etter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>kalles, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>til et bilde av én side.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden tømmer den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>under metoden OnEndPrint opphever tildeling objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerer dokumentet blir forhåndsvisning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview the print document.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data om hvordan du forhåndsvise Skriv ut dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Starter kontrollen sekvensen som bestemmer når og hvordan du forhåndsvise en side i dokumenter som skrives ut.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage kalles like før <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>oppretter den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som vises i løpet av forhåndsvisningen.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Etter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>kalles OnStartPage-metoden angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>til et bilde av én side.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden tømmer den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mens den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden opphever tildeling objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, makes the print preview look better.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Anti-aliasing, også kjent som grå skalering gjør forhåndsvisning ser bedre.

trans-unit.source: However, the use of anti-aliasing can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av anti-aliasing kan imidlertid redusere hastigheten gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: For more information about anti-aliasing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om utjevning den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerer dokumentet blir forhåndsvisning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data om hvordan du forhåndsvise en side i Skriv ut dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: I utgangspunktet den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for denne parameteren blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from this method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som ble returnert fra denne metoden brukes til å angi denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> som representerer en side fra en <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Starter kontrollen sekvensen som bestemmer når og hvordan du forhåndsvise dokumenter som skrives ut.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint kalles like etter <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>opphøyer den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>hendelsen.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint oppretter den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>som vises i løpet av forhåndsvisningen.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Når OnStartPrint kalles, den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>metoden angir den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>til et bilde av én side.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>metoden tømmer den <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, mens den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>metoden opphever tildeling objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint bekrefter at utskriften er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> som representerer dokumentet blir forhåndsvisning.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder data om hvordan du skriver ut dokumentet.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Skriveren navnet i den <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use anti-aliasing when displaying the print preview.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om det skal brukes anti-aliasing ved visning av forhåndsvisningen.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, uses several shades of gray around areas of curves and diagonals in text to give the text a smoother appearance.
trans-unit.target: Anti-aliasing, også kjent som grå bruker skalering, flere gråtoner rundt kurver og diagonaler i tekst slik at teksten en jevnere virkning.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > While using anti-aliasing makes the print preview look better, it can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Mens bruker anti-aliasing blir forhåndsvisning ser bedre, den kan redusere hastigheten gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the print preview uses anti-aliasing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forhåndsvisningen bruker anti-aliasing; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
